trailingComments.value:
*
 * A simple slide transition.
 *
 * @public
 * @property {Array} normal
 *   Transition from left to right
 * @property {Array} reverse
 *   Transition from right to left
 * @property {Array} up
 *   Transition upwards
 * @property {Array} down
 *   Transition downwards
